sentences.en: But nuance rarely figures in the debates of our age.
sentences.cn: 不过,在我们这个年代的辩论中,细节通常都不算数.

sentences.en: Delicate notes of leather, tobacco, vanilla and clove enhanced by a nuance of mint and spices.
sentences.cn: 皮革 、 烟草 、 香草和丁香的混合芬芳中隐约含有薄荷和香料的香气.

sentences.en: Harmonies are often absent unless one accepts the musical nuance of imitation as structured harmony.
sentences.cn: 除非人们愿意接受仿效结构之美的细微差别,否则和谐之美往往都是不足的.

sentences.en: He loved every nuance of pain that crossed her face, every time he touched her.
sentences.cn: 他爱着当他碰她时,她脸上每一寸细微的痛.

sentences.en: He was aware of every nuance in her voice.
sentences.cn: 他听得出她声音中的每一个细微变化。

sentences.en: He watched her face intently to catch every nuance of expression.
sentences.cn: 他认真地注视着她的脸，捕捉每一丝细微的表情变化。

sentences.en: He watched her face intently to catch every nuance of expression.
sentences.cn: 他认真地注视着她的脸,捕捉每一丝细微的表情变化.

sentences.en: I recognize the dangers subtlety and nuance in the face of the conservative movement's passionate intensity.
sentences.cn: 我看到了充满热情的保守派狂热运动所面临的些许危险.

sentences.en: Marbled grey nuance , supplied in kits of 2 mats.
sentences.cn: 灰色大理石色调, 供应的每个套件″2块垫子.

sentences.en: OBRIEN: Let's talk about the specific nuance, really, of that point.
sentences.cn: 奥布赖恩: 让我们详细地谈论一下细微的差别.

sentences.en: These users will easily learn each nuance of the applications they use.
sentences.cn: 这些用户会很快了解他们所使用程序的每一细微差别.

sentences.en: We can use our eyes and facial expressions to communicate virtually every subtle nuance of emotion there is.
sentences.cn: 我们用眼睛和面部表情几乎就能传达出情感上的每一丝微妙变化。

trans.tran_en: a very slight, hardly noticeable difference in manner, colour, meaning etc
